title: 'Boys and Girl - Former Cowboys/Pats WR Jesse Holley on Belichick/Garrett; Week 12 Pats Preview with MMQB's Albert Breer; Jerry/Belichick
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - Former Cowboys/Pats WR Jesse Holley on Belichick/Garrett; Week 12 Pats Preview with MMQB's Albert Breer; Jerry/Belichick
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby get the unique perspective of former Cowboys and Patriots receiver Jesse Holley ahead of this weekend’s match-up with New England. Plus, Albert Breer from MMQB stops by with his thoughts on the game. Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys' community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
